软件包 cn.org.rapid_framework.generator.util.paranamer

用于得到java method的方法参数名称.

请参见：
          描述

接口摘要
Paranamer Paranamer allows lookups of methods and constructors by parameter names.
 

类摘要
AdaptiveParanamer Implementation of Paranamer which chooses between a series of Paranamer instances depending on which can supply data.
BytecodeReadingParanamer An ASM-based implementation of Paranamer.
CachingParanamer Implementation of Paranamer which delegate to another Paranamer implementation, adding caching functionality to speed up usage.
DefaultParanamer Default implementation of Paranamer reads from a post-compile added field called '__PARANAMER_DATA'
JavadocParanamer Implementation of Paranamer which can access Javadocs at runtime to extract parameter names of methods.
JavaSourceParanamer get parameter names from java source file
JavaSourceParanamer.JavaSourceFileMethodParametersParser  
NullParanamer Implementation of Paranamer which adheres to the NullObject pattern
 

异常摘要
ParameterNamesNotFoundException Exception thrown when no parameter names are found
 

软件包 cn.org.rapid_framework.generator.util.paranamer 的描述

用于得到java method的方法参数名称. 如 find(String username), 用于得到username这个名称.
